summary: Retextures the RItter Armor by Kurese. Now makes it brown and gray.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Courier New][center][size=3]While I'm not sure this can be downloaded with NMM, It definitely can manually. All I did was retexture, you still need to download the original here --> http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13638

I think you also need CBBE. It might not work with the vanilla body.[/size]

[b]Please post screenshots! I'd love to see what they look like in your game :D
(Yes, my character has eyebrows. The helmet hides them.) 
[/b][/center][/font]
author: Caitl

files.name: Armor Retex
files.changelogHtml: First and probably final version. I most likely won't update.
